function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Assumption of independent and identically distributed residuals in the model.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Multivariate normal assumption for the distribution of random effects.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modeling the spread of contagious diseases such as covid-19 in cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharp increase in daily new cases and total confirmed cases for london","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of deaths related to covid-19 in london","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and space issues in a city like london","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Moderate negative correlation between temperature and covid-19 cases and deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reported impacts of humidity and temperature on covid-19 transmission and mortality rate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative association between climatic parameters and covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited depth analysis based on resistivity from viruses, population mobility, and individual health factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of city-level factors on covid-19 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability of covid-19 cases across different cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconclusive correlation between covid-19 transmission and climatic parameters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global transmission of covid-19 across diverse climates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density in big cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reproductive number r greater than
